title: InterfaceDataUnit-4_5 - 2025-02-13T11:02-0500
description: An agreed way of communication among SPEDS layers Transport (4) and Network (5).

context.description: The context shared between these two SPEDS layers. This is the ICI (Interface Control Information), i.e. an information passed across an interface to coordinate interactions between two adjacent layers.

source_iri.description: The source entity IRI (according to RFC3987).

destination_iri.description: The destination entity IRI (according to RFC3987).

tracking_number.description: The number used to track the SDU. If the SDU is a response (resp. a confirmation), it should be the tracking number of the corresponding original indication (resp. request).

options.description: The options shared between the layers.

message.description: The message shared between these two SPEDS layers. This is the SDU (Service Data Unit) of the Transport layer (4).
